item.title: Mid afternoon in the arctic
item.description: Anyone care to support my work on kofi¿ https://ko-fi.com/ledsenpotatis I am a man with no refuge, A world that whispers death songs Echoing screams claw at my mind, Turning safety to dust, belonging to ash. Nights are a war zone inside my skull, Where voices chant of all my failings, Every fractured moment replayed, The fault lines of a broken home, A child born from pain and silence, Crushed beneath heavy shadows cast by those who judge. I bear the scars that history wrote for me, A living testament to wounds not mine to claim, Yet the world sees only the mark, the stain, A life unwelcome, a silent plea drowned in hate. Yet in this void where love retreats, I stand a flicker in the endless dark, Not an abomination, but a soul unyielding, Fighting the screams with every breath, Seeking a dawn beyond the storm’s cold roar. This is the voice of a man lost, yet unbroken, Wrestling with ghosts and clawing for peace, Holding onto the fragile thread of tomorrow, In a world eager to see him erased, He whispers back, “I am still here.”
item.dc:creator: LedsenPotatis

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @harrisandy did this sketch and I think it's cool!
27 Man Tax: Grigor Dimitrov
“Who is the happiest of men? He who values the merits of others, and in their pleasure takes joy, even as though 'twere his own.” - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me! *+*+*+ There won't be a post tomorrow, I'll be on the road to Texas! Will be back with a post on Tuesday *+*+*+
item.dc:creator: MemeMuseumCurator

item.title: Joe Has Been Having A Blast In Nantucket For The Holidays, While Trump Dreams Of The Ghost Of Venezuela Blasts These Days
item.description: Had to share Barbara Sobel's comparing photos Post, to show there is an unbelievable difference between the two. Both were taken this extended Thanksgiving Weekend. Biden is looking good for his age and recent battles with cancer and walks like a normal human being, not to mention everyone he meets seem to genuinely like him. Trump meanwhile has a great looking ear.

item.title: I’m not gonna lie, that first day was a BITCH
item.description: I’m rocking Zyn packs now to help with cravings, and since I’ve decided I’m ready to date and be more social I don’t wanna smell gross. I quit alcohol (17 years sober) AND weed (3 years sober) so cigs were the last villain on the list. Getting a date will probably be harder than quitting cigarettes tho, I think. Anyways I just wanted to brag a little:)

item.title: GovBrief Today #304
item.description: The amateurs are running the wars. Two NY real estate guys are negotiating the end of a European land war with Ukraine in West Palm before one jets off to Moscow to meet Putin. A Fox News host ordered the death of two boat attack survivors clinging to wreckage in the water according to two Pentagon whistleblowers. Then he denied it. Bipartisan members of Congress are demanding answers. The Pentagon has already blown past legal deadlines to provide materials. Meanwhile, we're running joint operations in Syria with a president whose group the first Trump administration designated as foreign terrorists in 2018. He came off the list 23 days ago. Sarah Beckstrom was 20 when she was killed. Andrew Wolfe is 24 and in critical condition. They were West Virginia National Guard troops deployed under Trump's plan that federalized the DC police force. Now their families have been invited to the White House. Watch what comes next. Make sure the people representing you in Congress will verify the whistleblowers' story and act appropriately. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. You'll get data, images, quotes, and links to help you get engaged. Sign up free at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/rubio-ukraine-talks [2] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-release-mri [3] https://go.govbrief.today/wh-invites-family [4] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-hegseth-claim-order [5] https://go.govbrief.today/syria-us-joint-strike [6] https://go.govbrief.today/un-hrc-us-asylum
